name: Candy Stripe: Minarai Tenshi
overview: Candy Stripe: Minarai Tenshi (Candy Stripe 〜みならい天使〜) is an dating sim adventure game for the Sega Dreamcast. The game takes place in the fictional Holy Angels Hospital. The player is a medical intern, and the game's objective is to establish personal relationships with one of three incoming nurses over a one-year period.
